attributes.action: Link the personal tax allowances to the inflation rate.
attributes.additional_details: Link  personnel allowances for tax to compensate for the impact of inflation in order to prevent  the people from having less money in real terms due to the impact of inflation.
attributes.background: As wages rise in response to inflation  workers will be dragged into the relevant tax allowance brackets. Therefore the buying power of a wage is eroded by the tax bracket freezing policy.
